video.title: Saiko Pasu
video.synopsis: In the year 2113, people are given brain scans to determine how likely they are to commit a crime. Those who fail are apprehended, or even killed.

episodes.synopsis: Inspector Akane Tsunemori takes on her first case, which involves a man who kidnaps a woman and holds her hostage.
episodes.title: Crime Coefficient

episodes.synopsis: Recuperating from Akane's Paralyzer shot and the fallout from her first case, Kogami worries she's not inspector material.
episodes.title: Those Capable

episodes.synopsis: Ginoza, Akane and the Enforcers investigate the suspicious death of a drone at a drone manufacturing plant.
episodes.title: Rearing Conventions

episodes.synopsis: When the CID investigates Kimihiko Hayama's disappearance, they not only discover that he's been killed, but someone has taken over his net avatar.
episodes.title: Nobody Knows Your Mask

episodes.synopsis: After learning of another murder with the same modus operandi as Kimihiko Hayama's, the CID feels increased pressure to find the killer.
episodes.title: Nobody Knows Your Face

episodes.synopsis: Akane wants to learn more about Kogami's past and why he's an Enforcer, while CID detectives investigate the Hachioji Drone incident.
episodes.title: Return of the Psychotic Prince

episodes.synopsis: Ginoza realizes that the recent murders and the Specimen Case are related, and only one piece of evidence exists: a blurry image of Makishima.
episodes.title: Symbolism of Bletilla Striata

episodes.synopsis: Kogami determines that the girls' school killer isn't the same murderer from the years-old unsolved case, but is actually one of the students.
episodes.title: And Then, Silence

episodes.synopsis: While attempting to track down Makishima, Kogami takes Tsunemori to his former teacher for a crash course on criminal profiling.
episodes.title: Paradise Fruit

episodes.synopsis: Makishima and Senguji attempt to trap Kogami in an abandoned subway station using Akane's friend Yuki as bait, but all doesn't go as planned.
episodes.title: Methuselah’s Game

episodes.synopsis: Akane goes after Makishima alone after he captures her friend Yuki -- but, to her shock, Akane finds that her weapon is useless against him.
episodes.title: Saint’s Supper

episodes.synopsis: In an episode taking place three years prior to the beginning of the series, guitarist and latent criminal Yayoi is enlisted by then-Inspector Kogami.
episodes.title: Devil’s Crossroad

episodes.synopsis: The head of the Public Security Bureau, Joshu Kasei, orders Ginoza to capture Makishima, despite him being "criminally asymptomatic."
episodes.title: Invitation from the Abyss

episodes.synopsis: A series of crimes are committed by people wearing helmets that copy the low Crime Coefficients of innocent bystanders.
episodes.title: Sweet Poison

episodes.synopsis: Footage of the helmet-wearing criminals goes viral, prompting the public to respond with violence, and soon, riots break out.
episodes.title: The Town Where Sulfur Falls

episodes.synopsis: Akane, Kogami and Shusei trap Makishima in the Nona Tower, resulting in a battle that tests Akane's control over her emotions.
episodes.title: The Gate to Judgment

episodes.synopsis: After Makishima is arrested and the riots are controlled, Kogami's interest turns to how Makishima will be judged, as well as Shusei's whereabouts.
episodes.title: Iron Heart

episodes.synopsis: When Kasei takes Kogami off the Makishima case, Kogami suspects there is something more to it than just routine.
episodes.title: A Promise Written on Water

episodes.synopsis: Ginoza, whose Hue is now a problem, refuses therapy so he can retrieve Kogami and Makishima, who intends to attack Japan's food supply.
episodes.title: Transparent Shadow

episodes.synopsis: Akane contacts the Sibyl System and asks it to withdraw the execution order for Kogami if she accomplishes its request to capture Makishima alive.
episodes.title: Where Justice Lies

episodes.synopsis: As Makishima works on reprogramming the virus, Kogami and Akane arrive at the factory to stop him, which proves harder than they thought.
episodes.title: Blood-Stained Reward

episodes.synopsis: With Kogami and Makishima locked in mortal combat, Akane tries to uphold the law by stopping Kogami from killing Makishima.
episodes.title: Perfect World
